settings.title: Empowering and celebrating women is at the core of everything we do. Each Dai piece is inspired by the women we design for, and there’s nothing we’d rather do than celebrate YOU, the Dai’namic Woman.
What is the Dai Performance Program?
settings.answer:
Empowering and celebrating women is at the core of everything we do. Each Dai piece is inspired by the women we design for, and there’s nothing we’d rather do than celebrate YOU, the Dai’namic Woman. 

A £50 gift card offered to each Dai’namic Woman who receives, but is not limited to:

A job promotion

A new job 

A career award 

A record-setting achievement by your respective industry benchmarks

Or other career milestone or achievement

Because not all achievements are black and white. We’d love to hear so please tell us why in your submission.

To redeem your Dai reward, please submit proof or verification of your achievement such as a company document, internal communication, press mention or public record alongside a copy of your valid photo ID to experience@daiwear.com. We take privacy seriously, and we will not publicly share any image, document or information shared by you without your consent. You can view our privacy policy here.

Once verified, you will receive a digital £50 Dai gift card. This offer can only be redeemed once per calendar year and put towards any purchase over £150.

settings.title: Who/what is eligible to redeem the Dai Performance Reward?
settings.answer:
To be eligible for the reward, you will need to submit documentation via a link or image (dated beyond 1 January 2020). The following count towards redeeming the reward:

- Receiving a new job

- Receiving an internal promotion 

- Receiving an award relevant to your career 

- Win a record setting deal by industry benchmark

settings.title: How will I receive my reward?
settings.answer: A digital gift card for daiwear.com will be emailed to your account

settings.title: Terms & Conditions
settings.answer: Gift card valid for 3 months from date of issue. A minimum final net basket value after refunds and exchanges of £150/$175 USD is required to redeem offer. If the final net basket value falls below £150/$175 USD, your refunded amount plus the full value of the digital gift card will be returned to you. Cannot be used in conjunction with another offer and cannot be applied on VAT or shipping. Cannot be applied to previous purchases.

settings.faqleft:
How soon can I get my outfit?
Your suit will be sent to you within 1-2 business days via DHL Express if the order is placed by 4pm, Mon-Fri. Orders placed during the weekend will arrive on Tuesday.

Can I try things on to ensure the right fit?
Let's get it right from the start. Talk with our Stylists to ensure your best and most complimentary fit. You can also order two kits and return the one that doesn't fit. We'll refund you for that item minus £5 for shipping as long as it's posted within 24 hours and unworn, unwashed, undamaged with its original tag attached.

Can I rent for a later date?
We salute your organisation. You can absolutely reserve in advance, please get in touch with us to do so.

What if my size is out of stock?
Never fear, your fit will be here. Please get in touch with us to check when your size will be available again. We hold limited inventory in rental circulation during the pilot phase of the programme.
settings.faqmid:
How do I return my rental kit?
With ease. It's just like returning a regular purchased item. Using your included DHL returns label, you can book a collection or drop off at a DHL Service Point (more details here).

Am I responsible for cleaning the rental items?
We wouldn't do that to you. Our team will arrange all dry cleaning and processing following each rental.

What if I damage or lose my rental item?
Life happens. Don't worry about minor damages e.g. small spills, buttons loosening - it's on us. For major damages or loss, we reserve the right to charge the full market value.

What if I return a rental item late?
You’re busy. Plans change. We get it. After a grace period of 2 days, you will incur a £5/day fee. Contact us if you need an extension.

Can I keep an item for longer?
Of course! We can arrange rental extensions from £25/week. Get in touch with us.
settings.faqright:
Can I purchase the item I rented?
Yes! If you love it and want to keep it, we can sell it to you at a discounted rate, depending on how long it has been in rental circulation.

Can I rent outside of the UK?
Currently we only offer rentals to UK-based customers. We hope to eventually expand to other markets. Stay tuned for updates.

What if I want to rent items in a different colour or style combination?
Currently, only our three best-selling styles can be rented. Let us know which styles or colours you would like to see added in the future.

settings.text:
At Dai we celebrate women 365 days a year. As women, we persevere, we inspire and we blaze the trail for other women to follow. Success is not just defined by work, but life.

This International Women's Month, we want to give you a platform to share your inspirational stories. Tell us something you're proud of this past year!
settings.step1text:
We want to celebrate all women. These are not normal times, so why limit our achievements to only professional ones.

Tell us something you're proud of this past year (professional ones too, of course), e.g.

  • New job, promotion, pay raise
  • "Double duty" of childcare and work
  • Starting your own company
  • Returning to work after maternity
  • Being a single mum
  • Closing a fundraise
settings.step2atext: Tell us your story. Seriously do it, women do not self-promote enough. Read more here.
settings.step2btext:
Nominate an inspiring friend or colleague
They will receive an email from us about receiving their award.
settings.step3text:
Every Trailblazer™ Award submission will get:

  • An exclusive 20% off Dai discount code
  • A chance to win one of five £250 Dai Gift Cards with a DAI DNA™ Body Mapping Experience
  • The opportunity for your story to get featured across Dai's website, and social channels.

More importantly, we're celebrating you and your circle of inspiring stories.

settings.faqleft:
When is the nomination deadline?
March 31st, 2022 23:59 GMT (18:59 EST) through the form provided.

How many nominations can I submit?
Each person can submit up to five nominations, including one for herself.

Can non-UK residents be nominated?
Yes! If you win our surprise draw US residents will receive a $250 gift card.

Can I nominate someone I do not personally know?
You may, but you'll need to provide contact details of the nominee in order for us reach out to her about the award.

What do I have to provide in the submission?
We like keeping things simple. We simply need the nominee's: (1) name, (2) contact info, (3) occupation/title, (4) story. There's an optional step to attach photos and supporting documentation.
settings.faqmid:
How many awards are you giving out?
This is not a contest. We'd like to award every woman who submits a genuine and meaningful story.

When will I receive my award?
Once you have submitted your nomination, you will automatically be added into the prize draw to win one of five £250 Dai Gift Cards with a DAI DNA™ Body Mapping Experience. You're exclusive 20% discount code will be shared after your submission.

How do I use my 20% off discount code?

The exclusive code valid on orders from March 7th 2022 through to April 30th 2022 on purchases made through daiwear.com or in our new store at 35-37 Monmouth St, Seven Dials, Covent garden. Not applicable on any Power Move™ or Straight Leg Denim products. Not valid in conjunction with any other offer. Cannot be applied on a past order. One time use only.
settings.faqright:
What happens after I nominate a friend or colleague?
Once you have submitted her story, we will contact her with the 20% off code, with the details you have provided. She will also be entered into the prize draw.

How will awards be announced?
Awards will be announced on a rolling basis starting March 8th via email. We'll also announce you on our website and social media accounts if you elect to publish in the form.

Will my name and story be shared publicly? I am concerned about privacy.
We understand. On the nomination form, you can tell us whether you'd like your story and photo to be shared. You also have the option to be recognised as only your first name and/or occupation/title. We do encourage those who can to share and continue the circle of inspiration!

settings.text: We salute you.

settings.quote: Proud of myself for being the first person ever in my family to get a PhD, and landing my dream job.
settings.text:
This year, I'm really proud of myself for finishing a PhD thesis in Biochemistry and landing my dream job in the biopharmaceutical industry.

It was really difficult trying to do a PhD in the middle of a pandemic as my industrial placement was put on hold and site access was severely restricted. I ended up working part time at a prestigious university, and commuting for several hours twice a week to the industrial lab, whilst writing my thesis on trains.

Finishing it means I'll be the first person ever in my family to get a PhD once I've defended my thesis (whilst proudly wearing Dai) next month.
settings.name: Hannah, Assay Development Scientist

settings.quote: Making the leap and taking action, to work on my visa and landing a job with the company I wanted to work for.
settings.text:
This past year, I left a job where I didn’t feel appreciated and where my values didn’t align with the actions of the company.

I then navigated through the working visa process and got a new job with a company I had always wanted to work for. Making the leap was made harder by the fact I am foreign and need that work visa but I am so proud of trusting in myself and taking action.
settings.name: DAI'NAMIC WOMAN

settings.quote: I got a new job as an investor, where women represent just 13% of decision makers.
settings.text:
I got a new job as a Senior Vice President at a Silicon Valley Bank where I invest in series A onwards start-ups.

Currently on the investor side, women represent just 13% of decision makers.
settings.name: Alexandra, Senior Vice President

settings.quote: I finally got a team project off the ground that now has the attention of the entire company.
settings.text:
I started a new job in May 2020, It's my first time for a few things: working in the private sector, working in a large organization, and working in the field of medical devices.

I am learning this all while working from home with two kids under five whose daycare kept shutting down under COVID. But I can now proudly say it's all paying off - because I finally got a team project off the ground that now has the attention of the entire company.
settings.name: Anne, Government Affairs in healthcare

settings.quote: I am the first woman from ethnic minority background to lead a team of 200 people in my company.
settings.text:
I have recently been promoted to lead a team of 200 people, the largest team in our global business.

I am the first woman from ethnic minority background to achieve this in my company.
settings.name: ANNA, DIRECTOR

settings.quote: Finding my confidence after quitting a toxic job, and landing my dream job too!
settings.text:
At my last job I experienced severe burn out. Alongside palpitations, trouble sleeping, and anxiety, my self-confidence was completely crushed too. I began to feel like I was not worthy of my job and that I should be grateful I was even considered for the position.

But then, someone at one of my dream companies reached out to me on LinkedIn. I finally quit my toxic job and decided to give it a try - after all, I had nothing to lose. After the interview process which took 3 months, I got offered the job!

Today, I can proudly say that I have already been promoted at my new company, with another promotion in the making. I've found my confidence again, I'm not afraid to ask questions in public anymore, and I can say loud and proud that I have what it takes to make it to a leadership position.
settings.name: PATRICIA, SOFTWARE ENGINEER

settings.quote: Gave birth during lockdown, looked after my two kids, and started my new job as a CDO — the only female on my level.
settings.text:
I gave birth at home and looked after my two children due to the COVID situation. Alongside this, I worked 9 hours a week to keep everything going and started a new job as a Chief Data Officer in a larger publishing house.

I am very proud to say that I am the only female on my level and could negotiate flexible working hours to have enough time with my two children.
settings.name: TANJA, CHIEF DATA OFFICER

settings.quote: Incredibly proud of having published two books, and the work I've done in education and with school leaders.
settings.text:
Over the last two years, I'm incredibly proud of the work I've done in education and with school leaders.

At the start of the pandemic, I was incredibly worried about how I was going to pay my bills and support my family but was equally concerned for those who cannot support themselves during this challenging period — mostly families with children. This prompted me to set up a community of amazing educators who are passionate about supporting the wellbeing of staff and pupils through the global pandemic.

I am so proud of everyone in our collective and its many achievements in under a year including a webpage with a range of free wellbeing resources, blogs, podcasts, worksheets, and products for schools to use. Aside from students, we also cover staff wellbeing.

By October 2020, we were able to publish The Big Book of Whole School Wellbeing as a way to share our passion and what we've learned over the many years of working in education.

Another feat is having my book, 101 Playground Games, published by Routledge. It educates about the importance of outdoor play and learning for our children given the growing mental health crisis.

I also became a certified ICF Coach, and my Positive Playtime Programme in schools is receiving national acclaim.
settings.name: THERESE, AUTHOR AND FOUNDER

settings.quote: Surviving both bowel and breast cancer and sharing my story with my online community.
settings.text: Surviving both bowel and breast cancer and sharing my story with my online community.
settings.name: NINA, CUSTOMER RELATIONS

settings.quote: I'm still here and have survived.
settings.text:
I came to this country as a single mum with my eldest son battling what can only be described as the most acrimonious of divorces in India. Settling in a new country and leaving all that was dear to me was the toughest thing I've ever done.

Throughout the pandemic, I worked tirelessly as an A&E Doctor. Life in the Emergency Department can be busy and chaotic, but I wouldn't have it any other way. All that while balancing my life as a mum of two — an 18-year old and a 2-year-old.

Last year, I had the biggest scare of my life after my youngest son was admitted to PICU and needed to be on a ventilator. That has probably given me PTSD, but I'm still here and have survived.
settings.name: LAKSHMI, A&E DOCTOR

settings.quote: Working as a frontline doctor and looking after my two children during the pandemic.
settings.text: Working as a front line doctor during the pandemic and looking after my two little children was the biggest challenge in the last couple of years.
settings.name: ANNE, HOSPITAL DOCTOR

settings.quote: Getting out of a really bad place through therapy and taking the opportunity to land my dream job as a curator.
settings.text:
The last couple of years has been a real emotional rollercoaster.

I entered lockdown in a really bad place but was able to get therapy and the help I needed to get out of the rut.

I was also able to take the opportunity of stepping into an acting position before landing my dream job as a curator in an art museum.
settings.name: HELEN, CURATOR

settings.quote: Super proud of myself, as a young Chinese woman, for making my first career move to a tier 1 investment bank.
settings.text: After 5 years working in a Commercial Bank from a graduate to manager, I have finally made my first career move to one of the tier 1 investment bank. I am super proud of myself as a young professional Chinese woman (which you don’t see many in investment bank).
settings.name: Sarah, Risk Governance Associate

settings.quote: Growing my team, building a lab from scratch, and securing the funding we need to build a facility.
settings.text:
The past year has been a year of growth for myself and my company.

After working independently for many years, I grew my team, built a lab from scratch, and secured the funding we needed to construct a pilot facility. I'm incredibly proud of my team and what we've achieved together.

Along the way, I also learned how to progress in my own business by honing my leadership skills. Self-promotion is not something that comes naturally to me, but to convince others to get on board with my vision is necessary to reach it. I'm grateful for those who have supported me, and I hope my story can inspire women to step outside their comfort zone to do the same.
settings.name: Jen, CEO and Co-Founder of a biothermal company

settings.quote: I finished the manuscript of my first novel, whilst working full time and receiving my first promotion this year.
settings.text:
I am proud of myself for finishing a manuscript of my first novel (a lifelong dream), whilst working full time as a strategy consultant and receiving my first promotion this year.

It was not easy to find time for writing after long days of work, but I've been blessed with wonderful friends and family cheering me along the way.I wish any woman (and man!) who find themselves on a similar journey of balancing day work and night-time passion to never to give up, and remember the importance of the small steps - they accumulate over time.
settings.name: Joanna, Strategy Consultant

settings.quote: I was diagnosed with breast cancer, but remained strong, positive, and stylish throughout — despite losing my hair.
settings.text: I was diagnosed with breast cancer in 2020, and took the decision to have chemotherapy in the height of the pandemic. Remaining strong and positive whilst living on my own, and stylish throughout - despite losing my hair. I am keeping focused on my love for interiors, and I am now launching my own business making high-end lampshades.
settings.name: Vicky, Sales Advisor and Business Owner

settings.quote: Learning how to be brave and doing what feels right for me.
settings.text:
I got into a selective fellowship in radiology, and I'm halfway through.

However, due to an unforeseen personal crisis, I had to choose whether to quit or go to my family. Many have told me to stay, but it wasn't easy.

One day, I just broke down. I witnessed my emotional breakdown to understand how I was truly feeling. After that, I handed in my resignation.

This experience taught me that sometimes you have to be brave and do what feels right for you.
settings.name: Karen, Trained Radiologist

settings.quote: Proud of raising two strong, confident, and happy children after the devastating heartbreak of losing my firstborn son.
settings.text:
I'm proud of myself for raising two strong, confident, and happy children after losing my firstborn son. When my daughter was 10 weeks old, her older brother died very suddenly from meningitis.

Despite the heartbreak, we managed to give our daughter all the love and encouragement she needed to thrive. A year later, I got pregnant again and was blessed with another little boy.

To be able to parent well in the worst imaginable circumstances is a testament to how strong every one of us can be when needed.

Just like the Bob Marley quote, "You'll never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice."
settings.name: Zara, Full-time Mother

settings.text: You have places to go and people to see. You’re on the move, so we designed clothes that move at your speed.

settings.text: Say goodbye to your iron and dry cleaner. Meet easy durability and care.

settings.title: layout-1

settings.text: Our products are carbon neutral, biodegradable, certified chemically safe and made in responsible, energy-efficient factories in Europe. Its post-purchase lifecycle is energy efficient too when you wash cold and hang to dry.

settings.title: layout-jeans

settings.text: And most eco-friendly too. A year in the making, we've meticulously fine-tuned every design detail, perfected every fit, and sourced one of the lowest impact denim mills in the world.

settings.title: layout-jeans
settings.heading: Performance Denim
settings.text: Our first ever Performance Denim Collection features flattering, shape-defining power stretch with 40-50% elasticity, and it never loses its shape.

settings.title: layout-jeans
settings.heading: Responsibly Sourced
settings.text: Denim sourced from ISKO™, the world's largest mill pioneering Responsible Innovation™ in denim. Our denim is crafted using certified cotton, and certified reused and recycled yarns.

settings.title: layout-jeans
settings.heading: Made in England
settings.text: A year in the making, we’ve meticulously fine-tuned every detail over every prototype. Our Denim range has proudly and locally been cut and sewn by the iconic 150-year old Cookson and Clegg factory in Blackburn, England.

settings.title: layout-jeans
settings.heading: Easy on Our Planet
settings.text: Our denim results in 66% less fresh water usage and 26% less carbon usage on average than standard denim. The carbon footprint of your Dai denim is 6.3kg CO2e on average, which we're fully balancing and offsetting for you as part of our commitment to the planet.

settings.title: layout-cashmere
settings.heading: Closing the loop never felt so soft
settings.text: Made from recycled cashmere that has been regenerated into a new life. When you've worn yours out, return it to us and we'll renew it again.

settings.title: layout-cashmere
settings.heading: Going 360 Circular
settings.text:
Our circular design, our 360 range is made from recycled cashmere that has been regenerated into a new life. When you've worn yours out, return it to us and we'll renew it again.

Click here to recycle your 360 styles.

settings.title: layout-cashmere
settings.heading: Made in Italy with Zero-Waste
settings.text: Our sweaters are made of 98% post-consumer high-grade cashmere yarn collected from around the world and are sorted and respun at our factory in Prato, Italy. The renewing process preserves the original colours of the fibres, eliminating dyes and additional chemicals in the process, and in turn, reducing water consumption. We add 2% virgin wool for extra yarn strength.

settings.title: layout-cashmere
settings.heading: Recycled Cashmere
settings.text: Our recycled cashmere is Global Recycle Standard (GRS) Certified. By using recycled materials, we’re helping to reduce our reliance on new resources (virgin raw materials, water and energy).

settings.title: layout-cashmere
settings.heading: Extending the Lifecycle
settings.text:
Our cashmere yarns are beautifully soft and can be delicate. To keep your 360 styles looking great and lasting longer, make sure to hand wash only. Lay flat to dry and cool iron on the reverse if needed.

Top tip: take extra care when wearing jewelry and accessories to avoid snagging or pilling.

Heading abroad? There’s also a trolley sleeve that slides over a suitcase handle.

Plus, a padded section that fits up to a 16-inch MacBook.

It also features a durable water-repellent finish.

That's why our first ever showerproof coat is one-of-a-kind: made with a chemically safe water-repellent finish, recycled wool in the herringbone facing and a protective laminated inner layer, all from innovative Italian mill that's eco-certified and running on renewable energy.

The comfiest, most eco-friendly pair of jeans you'll ever own. Introducing Dai Performance Denim.

settings.title: The Gift of Elegance and Performance

settings.description:
The most important thing we wear is our confidence. At Dai, our mantra since Day 1 has been, comfort is confidence.

We imagined a world where clothes didn't restrict us, but rather empowered us. We imagined a world where comfort and elegance could coexist. We imagined a world where the performance of our clothes empowered the performance of our woman. You.

This year, give the gift of elegance and performance.

settings.title: Make a statement. Make it elegant.

settings.description:
Meet our modern yet timeless dresses featuring feminine waist-defining silhouettes in figure-skimming fabrics with luxurious drape.

The refinement is in the details — elegant balloon sleeves with pleats, flowing tie neck for styling, elasticated waistbands for extra comfort, and roomy pockets (always).

Your faves. Our greatest hits. All year round. Our original Power Move™ and Trail Blazer™ styles continue to deliver style and performance, year after year.

This year, go bold yet timeless in our newest hues: Evergreen, Espresso and Ivory.

You've stepped into the right place. From our original, bestselling Power Moves™, aka "the perfect trousers" from The Times, to our newest hits and newest innovations, we are best known for our revolutionary feels-like-yoga tailored comfort.

So Line Up to gift someone or FLOW yourself into our game-changing comfort.

And what you'll be wearing all winter and beyond. From our first ever circular design, the 360 Cashmere Sweater, to our Performance Knitwear made from ethically sourced New Zealand merino wool, our knitwear is the definition of luxurious elegance and warmth. P.S. It's also easy care.

Hey Dai'namic Woman! It's founder Joanna Dai here. More than anyone (although I know a few of you who also put our clothes through intense testing), I live and breathe in my Dai wardrobe, like it's my job or something.

A week in the life: I cycle to work and skip the outfit change. On days when I'm not cycling, I'm running around the city in back-to-back meetings — it's usually a bit more formal with a long tailored coat, and bike theft risk keeps me from riding. I hit up yoga or the indoor climbing gym after work. I even make it to a drink with friends, our team, or date night. Weekends in Dai? 100%.

So for me, everyday is a wear-test. And since I get asked a lot about what I wear, here's my guide for our Ultimate Performance Wardrobe.

1. For WFH, Lounging and Travel: Naming our styles is kind of a ritual around here, and these style names speak for themselves —Lounge Sweater and Treat Yourself Jogger. We envisioned this supersoft merino knitwear set to be the ultimate at-home luxury that's smart enough to wear out.

2. Cycle to Work, Work to Weekend: Our single greatest invention out of the pandemic is our FLOW Collection, which stands for, For Life Or Work. The Freedom Jogger has been our #1 WFH style and my go-to commute pant because the smartphone zip-pocket is genius. I flew to LA over Christmas in my FLOW Scuba Sweatshirt.

3. The One Hit Wonder: Literally. My Jumpstart Jumpsuit looks tailored and smart for work meetings and events, but is super comfy and flexible with its culotte shape for WFH and running around town. It's no wonder it sold out in 4 hours and we couldn't restock it fast enough all year.

For extra smart vibes, throw on our Trail Blazer Textured Grey.

4. Feels Like Yoga, Looks Like Business: Our core bestsellers just got an upgrade in an ultra-modern yet timelessly versatile new colour, Espresso (so good, you'll be buzzing all day).

For those with 75% black or navy in your wardrobe (raising my hand), Espresso is a neutral and flattering new colour to layer in and match back to everything. Styled here with Trail Blazer, Sharp Shooter, and Eco Layer On Top Cinnamon.

5. The Work to Workout: We're all channelling Lorelle, our incredibly energetic model, who took our ambitious vision and monkeyed up and down the climbing wall like an absolute pro.

Our brief for her? A photo of me wear-testing our Power Move FLOW Legging and Dai'namic FLOW Top. I started climbing out of lockdown, and it's been a great Friday night switch-off-from-work (but pack light, no outfit change) activity. Shot at my favourite London climbing gym, Yonder.

settings.title: The new normal is comfy, and we're here for it.

settings.description:
6. Work From Anywhere: The new normal is comfy, and we're here for it. It's where we started and where we always go back to.

No matter what day of the week it is, our soft, easy-care knitwear styles and tailored-yet-loungeworthy trousers are ready to keep you comfy and chic. Styled here with 360 Cashmere Sweater (our first ever circular design) and Line Up Trousers.

7. Our Performance Bestsellers: Last but certainly not least, our Power Move™ Family, Trail Blazer™ and Eco Luxe Essentials are here to stay. Tried and true, these style continue to deliver the ultimate comfort and performance.

With our latest generations, our Power Move and Trail Blazer styles are more planet-friendly than ever with GRS certified recycled yarns in over 40% of the styles, and Eco Luxe Essentials made from 94% certified biodegradable yarns.

Join the Dai'alogue.

Get early access on launches, exclusives and all things high-performing.

settings.title: Our global series of pop-up concept spaces is here.

settings.description:
At Dai our truest form of inspiration: YOU.

Join our community of Trailblazers for in-store events, where we collectively empower each other. Because after-all, we know the world is a better place when women succeed.

settings.title:
3 Ways to Make Moves in
the Perfect Trousers

settings.description: Let's face it we have all had to put up with uncomfortable trousers for far too long. What is the perfect trouser you might ask? The one that's the right length, doesn't dig into your sides as the day goes on. The one that lets you jump on a bike, run for that train and sit comfortably on those long haul flights.

Which trouser are you? No matter where your going our High Power Move™ 3.0 Trouser is the one for you.

Meet the super-flattering high-waisted version of the Power Move trousers. All the performance and comfort, with a side of extra leg elongation and waist definition.

Styled here with our Trail Blazer™ and the Not So Classic Shirt both in Midnight

settings.title: 2.  The Feels Like Yoga, Looks Like Business You

settings.description:
We've said it countless of times, but since launching the original Power Move™ Trousers in 2017, this family of feels-like-yoga tailored trousers continues to be our #1. These are the trousers that we want to wear all day, every day. The trouser that will last the test of time and go with anything in your wardrobe.

The Power Move™ 3.0 Trouser in Black styled here with our Classique Blazer in Black and our Now and Forever Blouse silk 2.0 in Ivory.

settings.title: 3. The Legging in Disguise, Always On-The-Go You

settings.description:
Dress code? Cracked. The Power Move™ FLOW legging has been designed for yoga or running, whatever your vice, but so sleek and tailored you can wear suited for meetings or smart casual for every day.

Style it up with our BAU Blazer in London Check and Eco Crew Top in Ivory. Or style it with our Dai'namic FLOW Top in Breton Stripe for a more sporty look.
EVERY DAY OUTFITTING, REWORKED. Start the week right with a rundown of smart casual styles to mix and match, featuring our feels-like-yoga, tailored pieces to wear from home and beyond.

01 — The Dai'namic Duo

Go to work and beyond in our perfectly tailored Waist Not Shacket, made from 100% Italian surplus wool, and polished Wide Leg Jean, which can be styled with any of our wardrobe staples — perfect for transitional seasons.

02— One and Done

For mornings when you don't have to think about matching, opt for our Stripe Right Jumpsuit. With its proportion-elongating silhouette, you’ll be looking polished every day and everywhere.

03 — Make Your Power Move™, Trailblazer

Comfort-empowered performance never goes out of style in our bestselling pair: The Power Move™ Trousers 3.0 and Trail Blazer™.

04— Stretch Goals? Easy.

It's Business As Usual no matter the day in our straight-fit tailored BAU Blazer paired with our Straight Leg Jean — both come with revolutionary power stretch to take you from Point A to B.

05— Easy Like A Breeze

Luxuriously soft from head to toe, our Icon Jumpsuit is made from Softree Ponte derived from FSC-certified yarns. Top it up with our 360 Cashmere Sweater, made in Italy from 100% recycled yarns.

06 — Pep In Your Step

For a foolproof combo, go monochrome. Mix and match our latest Straight Leg Jean in Ecru with the Darling Pep Top in classic black.
The World Earth Day Edit

settings.title: For Our People & Planet

settings.description:
This year 2022, we're committed to having more than 50% of our raw materials being sourced from predominantly recycled or bio-based fibre content. Through H2 2021, we have not only achieved but surpassed our goal at 34% natural bio-based yarn and 285 Global Recycled Standard (GRS) Certified yarn content in our products made. That's 62% combined in lower impact raw materials sourcing, having started at <5% at the beginning of the year.

JOANNA DAI, FOUNDER

Our first ever denim collection features a flattering, shape-defining power stretch that never loses its shape. It's made from certified and recycled yarn content using 65% less water and 22% less carbon compared to standard denim, and made in England.

And the fit? Perfected. A year in the making, we've meticulously fine-tuned every detail over countless prototypes, improvements, and wear-tests on so many women.

Available in three washes: Indigo, Black and Ecru. And two styles - The Wide Leg and The Straight Leg.

Our first-ever circular design, the 360 Cashmere Sweater is made in Italy with zero-waste from recycled cashmere that has been regenerated into a new life. Our recycled cashmere is Global Recycle Standard (GRS) Certified. By using recycled materials, we're helping to reduce our reliance on new resources (virgin raw materials, water, and energy).

And because we're going full circle and closing the loop, you can return your worn 360 Cashmere Sweater to us and we'll renew it into new life again. Yup, our cashmere is truly 360-degree circular by design. Learn more about the Renew and Recycle Program here.

settings.title: 03 — ECO LUXE ESSENTIALS

settings.description: Our softest base layers are made from 94% beechwood trees or 95% eucalyptus trees from sustainably managed forests with minimal waste in the production process. Our plant-based fibres are certified biodegradable.

settings.title: 04 — BOLD MOVE CREW

settings.description:
Natural, breathable, and biodegradable, our Bold Move Crew is made from merino wool that regulates your temperature for every season. It's innovatively developed, ethically sourced, and tested for performance and comfort.

Each sweater features anti-pilling side panels made of recycled viscose, a yarn derived from trees, in areas of more wear so your clothes will look fresher, longer. It's also Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) Certified, meaning each yarn is made from yarns that practise holistic respect for animal welfare and have a progressive approach to managing their land.

Available in two colours — Ivory, and Midnight.

settings.title: 05 — WAIST NOT SHACKET

settings.description: Waist, not waste. Meet our layering favourite, the Waist Not Shacket. It's made with surplus 100% Italian wool which would've otherwise gone to waste. This tailored piece is perfect for dressing up or down during transitional seasons.

settings.title: 06 — ICON CULOTTE AND ICON JUMPSUIT

settings.description:
Made from trees, feels like yoga — that's the promise of our latest Icon Jumpsuit and Icon Culotte. Made from Softree Ponte, the newest addition to our comfy fabric families, it's derived from 70% FSC® Certified viscose, a yarn from sustainably managed trees that has the softest hand-feel and plenty of stretch.

Available in two colours: London Grey and Flint Grey.

Made from 100% plants, the Chief Blouse is the latest in our Plant Silk family that exudes effortless elegance. It drapes elegantly and feels like silk with a luxurious soft sandwash finish. Made for the everyday, it's modern, elegant, and timeless that can be styled up or dressed down.

settings.title: 08 — DAI x TROUBADOUR

settings.description: For the Dai'namic Explorer. Introducing the DAI x Troubadour Apex Compact Backpack, the most versatile-yet-refined performance bag you'll ever meet. Each bag is made from 29 recycled bottles that's designed to perform for any day, in any condition. It's comfortable, compact, and lightweight in waterproof materials.
Introducing the Live In The Now Collection. You're exclusively invited to our 24-hour early access. Here's your sneak peek.

HERE'S THE MATHS: Majority of people wear only 20% of their closet 80% of the time. We think that's inefficient. Since launching in 2017, we developed a capsule wardrobe system that can be mixed, matched, and used 100% of the time.

settings.title: Here's your starter pack for the perfect capsule wardrobe:

settings.description: Did you expect anything less from us? Going back to our roots, our bestselling pair — Trail Blazer™ and Power Move™ Trousers — is the go-to combo for any woman who means business.
Simply put, this is your modern-day power piece. The BAU (Business As Usual) Blazer is our straight-fit tailored jacket made with premium Italian stretch technical wool with a twill weave.
The legging in disguise. Made with performance fabric that feels like athletic wear, our Power Move™ FLOW Legging is the tailored-meets-yoga pant to wear at work and to workout.
You've never owned a staple this cosy and soft. Meet the Eco Crew Top, our machine washable hero for seamlessly transitioning through the seasons.
Super soft and ethically made, our collection of dresses including the luxe All Day Chambray Dress and Happiness Is A Shirt Dress is the must-have for the woman on-the-go.
Flattering with shape-defining stretch, our Performance Denim is the comfiest, most eco-friendly pair you'll ever own. Style with a polished top or casual tee for work-to-weekend-ready outfits.

settings.title: Your Capsule Wardrobe, Cracked.

settings.description: TIMELESS, TAILORED, ELEGANT. Your new comfort zone is workleisure with 24/7 performance and comfort. It's true, we invented the original feels-like-yoga tailored workwear to take you from the boardroom, to yoga, to dinner, and everything in between.
Start your week in our Liberty Trouser and Trail Blazer™ in our newest mood-boosting limited edition hue, Prussian Blue, for the ultimate feels-like-yoga power look.
Bring your A-game in our new A-Line Sleeeless Dress for easy effortless elegance 24/7. This will be your new favourite one-and-done LBD for an always chic look.
Because every hour is power hour, be boardroom-ready wearing our Stand Tall Trouser with our Classique Blazer, but keep it soft and cosy with our Eco Crew Top.
Thursdays are the new Fridays, so you need an outfit that takes you from desk to drinks in no time. pair our waist-defining Trail Blazer with the Ace Skirt for happy hour chic.
Friday's call for a laid back style. Our favourite combo for days like this: the 24/7 Relaxed Shirt 2.0 and Liberty Trouser, designed for the everyday and everywhere.

settings.title: Move. Laugh. Live In The Now.

settings.description:
Here at Dai, we know that personal brand matters.

Since Founder Joanna Dai's first steps onto the trading floors of Manhattan's Wall Street fifteen years ago, we know that what you wear reflects how you are percieved. It represents your personal brand.

Fast forward to now, the importance of personal brand never changed, but the world of getting dressed for work has evolved. Dai is here to empower women with tailored, elegant, and most importantly, comfortable clothing that moves at your speed. So you can live in the now.

PLANT-POWERED ESSENTIALS TO WEAR 24/7

Transition seamlessly through the seasons with our Eco Luxe Essentials, now in a beautiful Black and Crimson Breton Stripe. Pair with your Dai wardrobe heroes or our latest Stand Tall Trouser.

TIMELESS. TONAL. MINIMAL.

Meet our latest timeless tonal hue, Shiiake. The ideal balance of cool and warm that brings a hint of fresh, elegant minimalism to your wardrobe.

Available in our bestselling Trail Blazer™, Liberty Trouser, and our latest design, the Ace Skirt.

BOLD. INTENSE. TRANSFORMATIVE.

Meet Prussian Blue, an accidental discovery in a Berlin alchemist laboratory in 170, this intense pigment transformed the course of art and fashion forever.

This limited edition colour is available in our bestselling feels-like-yoga styles: Trail Blazer™ and Liberty Trouser.

Shirting, Revolutionised.


Reintroducing our innovatively tailored yet very stretchy and comfy 24/7 Relaxed Shirt 2.0 — now in Blue Stripe and White.

Crafted with the same advanced technical features as our nearly sold-out Not So Classic Shirt, this is the oversized, curve-hemmed, effortlessly cooler relative.

NEW STYLES. YOU'RE INTO IT.

Because elegance never left. We know a thing or two about comfort, but it means nothing without elegance. That's why our latest styles are designed with timeless detailing and effortless wearability.

For the Dai'namic Woman who works from anywhere and simply wants to bring the tailored comfort to the everyday.

After all, the new normal is comfy, and we're here for it. Whether you're still WFH or on the move, we designed clothes with feels-like-yoga comfor to move at your speed.

AN EVERYDAY, ESSENTIAL DRESS

Fashion meets function in our timeless-yet-modern, effortlessly versatile dress styles like the our first ever LBD, the A-Line Sleeveless Dress, All Day Chambray Technical Shirt Dress, and the Happiness Is A Shirt Dress.

settings.description: Whether it’s going on a work trip or a weekend getaway, the new season calls for comfy silhouettes to keep you cool all day, week, and year long.

It’s taken us four years and countless prototypes to match the perfect lightweight performance fabric in our bestselling trouser silhouette. We finally did it.

Introducing the Liberty Trouser Lite, the same high-rise, form-fitting silhouette, but in a lighterweight, breathable fabric that’s perfect for the warm days ahead.

PS. It comes in our classic colours so you can wear them on repeat.

The definition of luxe sculpted knit, our newest Squared Away Stretch Knit Top is a fitted jumper silhouette with a flattering square neckline and slim-fitting cut, that’s transeasonal all year-round.

It's made with 86% recycled viscose yarn that’s cooling and breathable. It’s also machine washable and quick drying for easy wear.

Channel timeless and fun with our limited edition Dai Spot printed in our lightweight, Italian performance fabric with all-day stretch.

Our first set? The Spot Off the Press Skirt, the Spot Off the Press Palazzo Pant, and the Not So Classic Shirt in Dai Spot. Each piece can take you from work meeting to beach weekend.
Meet the Ace Skirt, designed with tailored detailing and made with the same performance fabric as our Power Move™ Trouser for every day comfort. Elevate your everyday workwear with this A-line skirt.

Fashion definitely meets function in our timeless-yet-modern, effortlessly versatile one-and-done styles, including our Icon Jumpsuit and Happiness Is a Shirt Dress.

Featuring performance fabrics and details that move with you, they’re the textbook achievers you’ve always looked for in clothing.
The finishing touch comes in our feels-like-yoga and elegantly tailored blazers that are easy wear, wrinkle resistant and travel friendly for your upcoming work trips and summer holidays.

settings.title: Welcome to comfort empowered performance workwear.

settings.description:
Founded by Joanna Dai, a former investment banker who was fed up with uncomfortable workwear over long days on-the-go, Dai has re-imagined a world where workwear doesn’t restrict us, rather empowers us to deliver our best performance. 

That’s why we’re here to you help you with all your uniform workwear needs, through comfort-led performance workwear. So your staff can focus on what really matters, which is — performance delivered.

Our core styles cover your requirements from suits, shirts, dresses and skirts, and all come in sizes XS to XXL, petites to tall, and plus sizes.

From elasticated waist bands to different silhouettes and lengths, we cater for every body shape so you can be comfortable your whole team will have suitable options.

We understand that every client is different, so we offer a range of customisation options to make sure all your workwear needs are being met. 

From a range of 40+ colours, to a bespoke patterns or prints, branding and trims, we can tailor our core styles to your specific requirements.

Utilising our much loved performance fabrics from womenswear, we have built a core menswear offering that will be launching Q1 2023. These core styles will include blazers, trousers, shirts and waistcoats with additional styles available upon request.

settings.title:
Introducing 360: Our Circular Design

ZERO-WASTE, RECYCLED CASHMERE

settings.description: The 360 Collection, our circular design, made in Italy with zero-waste from recycled cashmere which has been regenerated into a new life. Our recycled cashmere is Global Recycle Standard (GRS) Certified. By using recycled materials, we're helping to reduce our reliance on new resources (virgin raw materials, water, and energy).

The original 360, our 360 Cashmere Sweater is made of 98% recycled post-consumer high-grade cashmere yarns that are Global Recycle Standard (GRS) Certified. It’s a chunky knit that’s made from comfortable, breathable, compostable cashmere that regulates your temperature for every season.

The 360 V-Neck Cashmere Sweater is a midweight, oversized long sleeve sweater with a dropped armhole that’s framed by a relaxed V-neckline. Born out of post-consumer cashmere, this will be your new go-to layering piece to cosy up in.
A timeless luxe sweater made for the everyday, the 360 Seamless Cashmere Sweater is a lightweight sweater made from recycled cashmere with seamless panels for a sleek look.
The 360 Cashmere Beanie is our classic, luxe, super soft beanie that’s reversible for you to wear whichever stitch you prefer. It's naturally insulating and perfect for those cooler winter days

Because we're going full circle and closing the loop, each sweater is made from recycled and regenerated cashmere yarn. When you've worn yours out, please return it back to us so we can renew it into new life again. Yup, our cashmere is truly 360-degree by design.

settings.title: DELIVERY
settings.text:
UK

STANDARD UK DELIVERY 

  • We offer FREE Royal Mail Tracked Delivery with an estimated delivery of 2-4 working days.

EXPRESS NEXT DAY UK DELIVERY 

(For orders placed before 12PM GMT) 

  • For all orders over £250 we offer FREE Next Day DPD delivery. 
  • For all orders under £250 we offer Next Day DPD delivery at a flat rate of £10.  

 

REST OF WORLD- TRACKED & SIGNED DELIVERY

EUROPE (EU & Non-EU):

  • For all orders over £250 we offer FREE DHL Economy GoGreen Shipping with an estimated delivery of 4-6 working days. 
  • For all orders under £250 we offer DHL Express GoGreen Shipping with an estimated delivery of 4-6 working days for a flat rate of £20. 

Australia, New Zealand, Canada, Hong Kong, Singapore, Japan

  • DHL Express GoGreen Shipping with an estimated delivery of 3-7 working days at a flat fee of £25. 

India, Israel, Malaysia, Taiwan, United Arab Emirates, Cayman Islands, Puerto Rico

  • DHL Express GoGreen Shipping with an estimated delivery of 3-7 working days at a flat fee of £35. 

US

  • We offer FREE US shipping on total order values above $350 via DHL Express GoGreen Shipping with an estimated delivery of 3-5 working days. 
  • For orders below $350, we offer a flat shipping rate of $20.


Any applicable import customs duty and taxes will be billed to the customer.
Not seeing your country? Email us at experience@daiwear.com.

settings.title: TAXES AND DUTIES OUTSIDE THE UK
settings.text:
Brexit update for EU customers: As of Jan 1, 2021, non UK customers may be asked to pay duty, taxes, and customs fees before they can receive their shipments. Dai is not responsible for local import duties and taxes, please consult your local customs office for more information. 

As of Jan 1, 2021, non UK customers may be asked to pay duty, taxes, and customs fees before they can receive their shipments. Dai is not responsible for local import duties and taxes, please consult your local customs office for more information. 

To compensate for this inconvenience we do offer our customer the possibility to refund 20% UK VAT included in all GBP retail prices upon proof of local VAT payment. Please contact us directly at experience@daiwear.com and we will happily assist you with this refund.

settings.title: Return and Exchange
settings.title2:
All purchases may be returned within 28 days of the signature of receipt. Items must be unworn, unwashed, undamaged with all original tags attached. We offer free returns within the UK, for returns outside of the UK, we are not able to provide complimentary return shipping. The return shipping cost is equal to the outbound shipping cost for your country as per the shipping costs above, and will be deducted from your total refund amount.

FREE Exchange for UK. On all exchanges, the return must be returned within 14 days of the delivery date. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and undamaged with all original tags attached.

settings.title: Return or Exchange your orders in a few steps
settings.text:
1. Open the Returns Portal & enter your Order Number + email address.

2. Select the item(s) you would like to return & select if you would like to Return, Exchange for other sizes/colours or Exchange for a gift card.

4. Download the QR code or label for use in any Royal Mail (UK) or USPS or DHL Service Point (Rest of the World).

5. Drop it off at your nearest Drop Off Point shown from the portal.

Once we receive and verify your returned items your new replacements will automatically be sent out to you, it’s as easy as that.

Alternatively, you can return your order in our flagship store located in 35-37 Monmouth Street, London.

Once your return has arrived, please allow 14 working days for your refund to be processed. We’ll send you an email once the refund is on its way. Please note that refunds will be made to the original method of payment.

Reach out to us at experience@daiwear.com if you have any questions.

What if my items arrive damaged or incorrect?

We inspect each of our products to meet the highest quality standards before shipping. If you receive a damaged or incorrect item due to a manufacturing fault, please contact experience@daiwear.com with your order number and description and photos of the damaged item. We’ll be sure to look after you.
